messages.content: You are a helpful AI assistant.
Why are yellowjackets in Arkham?
Charles Leiter owed a great deal of money to their bosses in Atlantic City.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the yellowjackets' main goal in Arkham?
They are trying to cover up something about Charles Leiter's death.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Who has been under the yellowjackets' observation?
Lucy Stone, who works at the speakeasy and has been their one decent lead.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What interest will the yellowjackets take in Lucy Stone's interests?
They will take a close interest in anybody who takes an interest in her.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Who are the investigators in this text?
The investigators are mentioned as a group, but one of them, Oak, and Shaunassy are specifically mentioned as being involved.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Who is Lucy Stone, and what is her role in this story?
Lucy Stone works at a speakeasy, and the investigators are taking a close interest in her.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the status of Leiter's body in the eyes of the Atlantic City hoods?
The Atlantic City hoods think Leiter is alive, and any evidence showing his death may be disbelieved or seen as convincing only if extreme.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the motivation of the Atlantic City hoods in this text?
The Atlantic City hoods are largely motivated by a desire to disbelieve Leiter's death, as they think he is alive.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the main task given to the Atlantic City hoods?
They are tasked with the collection of a gambling debt of $11,000 dollars.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How much debt do the Atlantic City hoods need to collect?
$11,000 dollars
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the condition for the Keeper to go after the Witch Trial Papers?
The Keeper may decide that they will go after them if they discover the Witch Trial Papers' existence and worth.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the state of Leiter's corpse that might disbelieve the Atlantic City hoods of his death?
The poor state of the corpse
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What can persuade the group that Leiter is genuinely dead?
Showing them Leiter's body
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the group tasked with collecting?
$11,000 dollars
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What methods will the group use to deal with debtors?
Threats and casual violence
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What type of violence will the group avoid?
Public displays
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the preferred method of attack for the Call of Cthulhu's minions?
They will resort to threats and casual violence as a matter of course.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the condition under which the minions will engage in willful murder?
They will not engage in willful murder unless attacked themselves.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What types of weapons do the minions carry?
They are armed with knuckledusters, straight razors, and heavy-caliber pistols.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the preferred approach of the minions when dealing with a target?
They will try to isolate a target rather than risk getting outnumbered.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Who is the rival to the investigators?
T
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What does T want concrete proof of?
Leiter's death
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What does the Keeper note that T and the other investigator are?
A deliberate spoiling factor for the scenario
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Can T and the other investigator be used to provide physical action?
Yes, they can serve as fodder for a stand-up fight
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Where can the hoods pay a visit to introduce themselves?
Leiter’s cottage
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What do the hoods want to get from Leiter in the introduction?
Leiter and the money owed
